app_name.description: Please, don't translate this variable message

app_description.message: Different tools useful for WordPress developers and users

msg_only_http.message: Only in https or http pages.

msg_2_only_http.message: Click on this extension when you are on pages like

btn_dns_checker_ipv6.message: Check with DNS Checker and IPv6

btn_mx_mx_toolbox.message: Check MX records with MX Toolbox

btn_blacklist_mx_toolbox.message: Check if you are blacklisted with MX Toolbox

msg_other_wpo_links.message: Other tools to measure performance but do not accept the direct sending of the url so you will have to write it once it is on the page

msg_no_favicon.message: No website icon has been defined

msg_incognito_yes.message: It's showing in an incognito window

msg_incognito_no.message: It's not showing up in an incognito window

msg_pretransfer_time.message: Time before sending the first byte

msg_starttransfer_time.message: Time until the first byte is sent

msg_generate_salt.message: Generate security keys for AUTH_KEY, SECURE_AUTH_KEY, LOGGED_IN_KEY, NONCE_KEY, AUTH_SALT, SECURE_AUTH_SALT, LOGGED_IN_SALT and NONCE_SALT

msg_next_plugins.message: Here we will show you a selection of the best plugins used personally and of proven efficiency and performance. Some of the links shown here are affiliate links, but they will always be products used personally, we will never recommend products that we do not use and we are totally convinced of their proven effectiveness.

msg_next_themes.message: Here we will show you a selection of the best themes used personally and of proven efficiency and performance. Some of the links shown here are affiliate links, but they will always be products used personally, we will never recommend products that we do not use and we are totally convinced of their proven effectiveness.

msg_codeable_plugins.message: Whether you need to modify a plugin, create one from scratch, add functionalities to a plugin you use or any imaginable customization, you can hire the best WordPress programmers at Codeable.

msg_codeable_themes.message: Whether you need to modify a WordPress theme, create one from scratch, create a child theme, add functionality to a theme you use or any imaginable customization, you can hire the best WordPress programmers at Codeable.

msg_siteground_text.message: We recommend SiteGround hosting if you want to have a web in WordPress or an e-commerce with WooCommerce, with all the utilities of a managed hosting, in addition to email, domain management and other utilities included in the plan, such as automatic updates of WordPress and its management from the command line with WP-CLI

msg_kinsta_text.message: Kinsta is powered exclusively by the Google Cloud Platform and uses Google Cloud's premium global network to ensure your sites load even faster. Kinsta is recommended by the Google Cloud as a fully managed WordPress hosting solution. Recommended solution to get the most out of your website or e-commerce store.

msg_basic_nginx.message: Basic configuration of WordPress in Nginx

msg_divi_themes.message: You've never built a WordPress website like this before. Divi is more than just a WordPress theme, it's a completely new website building platform that replaces the standard WordPress post editor with a vastly superior visual editor.

msg_bloom_plugins.message: Convert Visitors Into Loyal Followers. Bloom gives you all the tools you need to turn your website's visitors into loyal followers and customers. Not only is Bloom going to convert extremely well, it's going to look great doing it.

msg_elementor_plugins.message: The World's Leading WordPress Page Builder. Pixel Perfect Design in WordPress. The only complete design platform to offer pixel perfect design, yet produces 100% clean code.

msg_flywheel_text.message: Whatever your work environment, Flywheel's powerful WordPress platform removes all the hassles of hosting, streamlines your processes, and lets you get back to doing your best work.

msg_filter_query.message: Filter Suspicious Query Strings in the URL
